home.title: Web Application Template
home.description: A modern, secure web application built with SvelteKit and Rust. Features user authentication, protected routes, and a beautiful UI with advanced theming.
home.feature.auth.title: Secure Authentication
home.feature.auth.description: JWT-based authentication with Argon2 password hashing and OAuth support
home.feature.performance.title: High Performance
home.feature.performance.description: Rust backend with SvelteKit frontend for optimal speed and reliability
home.feature.theming.title: Advanced Theming
home.feature.theming.description: Dark/light modes with system preference detection and design tokens
home.feature.types.title: Type Safety
home.feature.types.description: Full TypeScript support with strict type checking and modern tooling

profile.accountCreated: Your account has been successfully created using OAuth. You can now access all features of the application.

auth.errors.inviteOnly: Registration is by invitation only. Please contact an administrator.

auth.errors.createAccount: Failed to create user account. Please try again.

auth.errors.generateToken: Failed to generate authentication token. Please try again.

payment.pageDescription: Complete your payment to access all features
payment.title: Payment Required
payment.description: To continue using our service, please complete your payment. This is a one-time payment that gives you full access to all features.
payment.secureNotice: Your payment information is secure and encrypted.
payment.error.initialization: Failed to initialize payment. Please try again.
payment.error.processing: Payment processing failed. Please try again.
payment.error.unexpected: An unexpected error occurred. Please try again.
payment.error.incomplete: Please fill in all required fields.
payment.success.missingIntent: Payment information is missing. Please try again.
payment.success.title: Payment Successful!
payment.success.description: Thank you for your payment. You now have full access to all features.
payment.success.processingDescription: Your payment is still being processed. You can continue to the app, and we'll update your status once processing is complete.
payment.success.failedDescription: Unfortunately, your payment could not be processed. Please try again or contact support if the issue persists.
payment.cancel.title: Payment Cancelled
payment.cancel.description: Your payment was cancelled. You need to complete payment to access all features of the application.
payment.cancel.helpText: If you're experiencing issues, please contact our support team.
